hero.name: Marie Danielle Akpeuby
hero.title: Fullstack Developer & DevOps
hero.subtitle: I create modern, high-performance web applications using the latest technologies

about.title: About me
about.description: Fullstack & DevOps developer passionate about creating innovative web applications. I combine technical expertise in React, Next.js, Node.js and extensive experience in DevOps with Docker, Kubernetes and CI/CD.

web.title: Web Development
web.description: Modern, high-performance web applications with React, Next.js, Node.js

api.title: API & Backend
api.description: Robust REST APIs with Node.js, Express, Django, FastAPI

devops.title: DevOps & Cloud
devops.description: CI/CD, Docker, Kubernetes, deployment and monitoring

ai.title: AI Integration
ai.description: Conversational agents, RAG, automation with CrewAI

items.name: Jean-Pierre Kouadio
items.content: Marie Danielle transformed our vision into a high-performance web application. Her technical expertise and professionalism are remarkable.

items.name: Fatou Diallo
items.content: Excellent collaboration on our microservices project. Her DevOps expertise has enabled us to significantly improve our deployment pipeline.

items.name: Amadou Traor√©
items.content: The AI integration she did for our chatbot exceeded our expectations. High-quality work delivered on time.

items.question: What types of projects do you work on?
items.answer: I develop full-stack web applications, APIs, showcase websites, dashboards and complete DevOps solutions.

items.question: What are your turnaround times?
items.answer: Turnaround times vary depending on the complexity of the project. A showcase website generally takes 2-4 weeks, a complex web application 2-3 months.

items.question: Do you offer maintenance?
items.answer: Yes, I offer maintenance contracts to ensure that your applications run smoothly and are kept up to date.

items.question: How does a project work?
items.answer: Each project begins with a discovery phase, followed by design, development, testing, and deployment.

contact.title: Contact me
contact.subtitle: Let's discuss your project
contact.description: Feel free to contact me to discuss your projects, ask questions or just say hello. I'm always open to new opportunities and collaborations.
